class src.database.models.Contact(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model for the ‘contacts’ table.

This model defines the table structure in the database, including the columns and their properties, for storing contact information.

additional_data: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.str | None

Additional information about the contact.

birthday: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'datetime.date'>

The contact’s birthday.

email: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'str'>

The contact’s email address.

first_name: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'str'>

The first name of the contact.

id: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'int'>

The unique identifier for the contact.

last_name: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'str'>

The last name of the contact.

owner: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.User

The owner of the contact, linked via a relationship.

owner_id: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'int'>

The foreign key linking the contact to its owner.

phone: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'str'>

The contact’s phone number.

class src.database.models.User(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model for the ‘users’ table. Stores user information including authentication data and roles.

avatar_url: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.str | None

The URL to the user’s avatar image.

contacts: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.list['Contact']

A collection of contacts owned by this user.

created_at: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'datetime.datetime'>

The timestamp when the user account was created.

email: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'str'>

The user’s email address, used for login and verification.

id: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'int'>

The unique identifier for the user.

is_verified: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'bool'>

A flag indicating whether the user’s email has been verified.

password_hash: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'str'>

The hashed password for user authentication.

refresh_token: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.str | None

The refresh token for maintaining user sessions.

role: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<enum 'UserRole'>

The user’s role (e.g., USER or ADMIN).

updated_at: sqlalchemy.orm.Mapped.<class 'datetime.datetime'>

The timestamp of the last update to the user’s account.
